recipes.name: Nigiri sushi
recipes.cooking_method: Form the rice into small oblong shapes, place a piece of fish on top, and serve with wasabi, soy sauce, and pickled ginger.

recipes.name: Kitsune udon
recipes.cooking_method: Boil the noodles, then add the fried tofu and dashi stock, and season with mirin and soy sauce.

recipes.name: Ebi tempura
recipes.cooking_method: Coat the shrimp in a batter made from flour, cornstarch, water, and egg, and deep-fry until golden brown.

recipes.name: Shoyu ramen
recipes.cooking_method: Boil the noodles, then top with slices of pork belly and a broth made from soy sauce, mirin, and chicken broth.

recipes.name: Hiroshima-style okonomiyaki
recipes.cooking_method: Mix the cabbage, flour, egg, and noodles, then add slices of pork belly and cook on a griddle.

recipes.name: Gyudon
recipes.cooking_method: Cook the beef and onions in a broth made from soy sauce and mirin, then serve over a bed of rice.

recipes.name: soba
recipes.cooking_method: Mix buckwheat flour and water, knead into a dough, roll out, and cut into noodles. Boil the noodles, then serve with a dipping sauce made from soy sauce, mirin, and scallions.

recipes.name: Tonkatsu
recipes.cooking_method: Coat the pork loin in flour, egg, and panko breadcrumbs, then deep-fry until golden brown. Serve with shredded cabbage.

recipes.name: Yakiniku
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate the beef in a mixture of sesame oil, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger, then grill and serve with dipping sauces.

recipes.name: Osaka-style okonomiyaki
recipes.cooking_method: Mix the cabbage, flour, egg, and grated yam, then add slices of pork belly and cook on a griddle.

recipes.name: Takoyaki
recipes.cooking_method: Mix the flour, egg, and dashi stock, then pour the batter into a takoyaki pan and add a piece of octopus and green onion to each ball. Cook until golden brown.

recipes.name: Matcha mochi
recipes.cooking_method: Mix the sweet rice flour, matcha powder, sugar, and water, then steam until cooked. Roll the mochi in cornstarch to prevent sticking.

recipes.name: Chirashi sushi
recipes.cooking_method: Mix the sushi rice with vinegar, then top with slices of raw fish, vegetables, and egg.

recipes.name: Tonkotsu ramen
recipes.cooking_method: Simmer pork bones and chicken stock for hours to create a flavorful broth. Serve with ramen noodles, slices of pork belly, and a soft-boiled egg.

recipes.name: Chicken katsu curry
recipes.cooking_method: Coat chicken breast in flour, egg, and panko breadcrumbs, then deep-fry until golden brown. Serve with curry sauce and steamed rice.

recipes.name: Kitsune udon
recipes.cooking_method: Cook the udon noodles, then serve in a bowl of dashi stock with sliced tofu, green onion, and tempura flakes.

recipes.name: Mixed tempura
recipes.cooking_method: Coat the shrimp, asparagus, and sweet potato in tempura batter, then deep-fry until crispy.

recipes.name: Strawberry mochi
recipes.cooking_method: Mix sweet rice flour, sugar, and water to make mochi dough. Fill each mochi with a strawberry, and roll in potato starch to prevent sticking.
